introduction: This section is designed to help you strengthen your knowledge of React Native and mobile app development. You’ll start with the fundamentals—learning about components, JSX, and basic styling to build simple UIs. As you progress, you’ll dive into state management, props, and navigation, understanding how to create interactive and dynamic app experiences. Finally, in the advanced topics, you’ll tackle animations, performance optimization, and integrating native modules, gaining the skills to build high-quality, production-ready apps.

levels.intro: Start here to learn the essentials of React Native, focusing on building basic components and understanding the core concepts. This stage will get you comfortable with creating simple mobile UIs.

topics.title: Components & JSX
topics.description: Learn the basics of building UI using components and JSX syntax.

topics.title: Props & State
topics.description: Understand how to pass data and manage component memory.

topics.title: Styling
topics.description: Apply styles using React Native’s styling system.

topics.title: Basic Layouts
topics.description: Arrange components with Flexbox for responsive design.

topics.title: Handling Events
topics.description: Set up user interactions like taps and gestures.

levels.intro: This category will help you expand your knowledge to create more dynamic, interactive, and organized apps. You’ll focus on managing data, navigating between screens, and handling more complex components.

topics.title: Navigation
topics.description: Implement navigation between screens using React Navigation.

topics.title: State Management
topics.description: Manage app state efficiently with Context API or libraries like Redux.

topics.title: API Integration
topics.description: Fetch data from external sources and handle asynchronous operations.

topics.title: Forms & User Input
topics.description: Work with inputs, forms, and validation.

topics.title: React Native CLI
topics.description: Familiarize yourself with the command-line interface for better control.

levels.intro: At this level, you’ll explore features for building polished, high-performance apps. Expect to work with animations, native modules, and advanced optimization techniques.

topics.title: Animations
topics.description: Create smooth animations using the Animated API or Reanimated.

topics.title: Performance Optimization
topics.description: Techniques to improve rendering speed and reduce lag.

topics.title: Custom Native Modules
topics.description: Integrate native code for extended functionality.

topics.title: Offline Functionality
topics.description: Implement features like local storage and caching.

topics.title: Testing & Debugging
topics.description: Ensure app stability with testing and debugging tools.
